mapper.select: select A.NAME from MEMBER A, SPACE_MEMBER B where B.SPACE_NO = #{spaceNo} and A.MEMBER_NO=B.MEMBER_NO
mapper.update: update KANBAN_DETAIL set CONTENT=#{content}, charge=#{charge}, STATUS=#{status}, UPDATE_DATE=SYSDATE where KANBAN_DETAIL_NO=#{kanbanDetailNo}
mapper.select: select PASSWORD from (select PASSWORD from MEMBER where MEMBER_NO= (select MEMBER_NO from SPACE_MEMBER where SPACE_MEMBER_NO= (select SPACE_MEMBER_NO from KANBAN_DETAIL where KANBAN_DETAIL_NO=#{kanbanDetailNo})))
